sdg.3: Sdg n°3: Good health and well-being
sdg.6: Sdg n°6: Clean water and sanitation
sdg.7: Sdg n°7: Affordable and clean energy
sdg.8: Sdg n°8: Decent work and economic growth
sdg.9: Sdg n°9: Industry, innovation and insfrastructure
sdg.11: Sdg n°11: Sustainable cities and communities
sdg.12: Sdg n°12: Responsable consumption and production
sdg.16: Sdg n°16: Peace justice and strong institutions
sdg.17: Sdg n°17: Partnership for the goal

sdgGoals.1: End poverty in all its forms everywhere
sdgGoals.2: End hunger, achieve food security and improved nutrition and promote sustainable agriculture
sdgGoals.3: Ensure healthy lives and promote well-being for all at all ages
sdgGoals.4: Ensure inclusive and equitable quality education and promote lifelong learning opportunities for all
sdgGoals.5: Achieve gender equality and empower all women and girls
sdgGoals.6: Ensure availability and sustainable management of water and sanitation for all
sdgGoals.7: Ensure access to affordable, reliable, sustainable and modern energy for all
sdgGoals.8: Promote sustained, inclusive and sustainable economic growth, full and productive employment and decent work for all
sdgGoals.9: Build resilient infrastructure, promote inclusive and sustainable industrialization and foster innovation
sdgGoals.10: Reduce inequality within and among countries
sdgGoals.11: Make cities and human settlements inclusive, safe, resilient and sustainable
sdgGoals.12: Ensure sustainable consumption and production patterns
sdgGoals.13: Take urgent action to combat climate change and its impacts
sdgGoals.14: Conserve and sustainably use the oceans, seas and marine resources for sustainable development
sdgGoals.15: Protect, restore and promote sustainable use of terrestrial ecosystems, sustainably manage forests, combat desertification, and halt and reverse land degradation and halt biodiversity loss
sdgGoals.16: Promote peaceful and inclusive societies for sustainable development, provide access to justice for all and build effective, accountable and inclusive institutions at all levels
sdgGoals.17: Strengthen the means of implementation and revitalize the global partnership for sustainable development
